metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5273 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.2, 4.1.x before 4.1.14.3, and 4.2.x before 4.2.7.1 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) browse table page, related to js/sql.js; (2) ENUM editor page, related to js/functions.js; (3) monitor page, related to js/server_status_monitor.js; (4) query charts page, related to js/tbl_chart.js; or (5) table relations page, related to libraries/tbl_relation.lib.php.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
